plotScripts.barchart:
require(ggplot2)
require(e1071)
require(dplyr)

data$!(splitColumnName)[is.na(data$!(splitColumnName))] <- 'NAs'
data <- data %>% group_by(!(groupByList)) %>% summarise(!(valueColumnName) = (!(valueAggrType))(!(valueColumnName)))

plt <- ggplot(data,aes(x = reorder(!(splitColumnName),!(barSortOrder)!(valueColumnName)),y = !(valueColumnName))) +
  geom_bar(stat='identity',fill = 'green4') +
  labs(x = '!(splitColumnName)', y = '!(valueColumnName)') +
  geom_text(aes(label=!(valueColumnName))) +
  coord_flip()
plotScripts.boxplot:
require(ggplot2)
plt <- ggplot(data,aes(!(categoryColumnName)!(valueColumnName)!(binColorColumnName))) +
  geom_jitter(shape = 20!(markerColorColumnName)) +
  geom_boxplot(lwd = 1,alpha = 0.8) +
  stat_boxplot(geom ='errorbar') +
  stat_summary(fun=mean, geom='point', shape=20, size=5, color='black', fill='black')
plotScripts.correlationplot:
require(dplyr)
require(ggcorrplot)
data <- data %>% select(!(xColumnNames))!(dateConvert)
corr <- round(cor(data ,use='complete.obs'!(correlationType)), 3)

plt <- ggcorrplot(corr, lab = TRUE)
plotScripts.linechart:
require(dplyr)
require(gridExtra)
funs <- list(!(yAggrTypes))
data <- data %>% select(!(xColumnName),!(yColumnNames))
cols <- names(data)
summaryDf <- data.frame(!(xColumnName) = levels(as.factor(data$!(xColumnName))))
plts <- list()
for (i in 1:length(funs)){
    summaryDf <- data %>% group_by(!(xColumnName)) %>% summarize_at(.vars = cols[i+1], .funs = funs[[i]])
  summaryDf$!(xColumnName) <- as.numeric(summaryDf$!(xColumnName))
  plts[[i]] <- ggplot(summaryDf[!is.na(summaryDf[i+1]),], aes_string(!(xColumnName),cols[i+1] , group = 1)) + geom_line()
}
plt <- do.call(grid.arrange,plts)
plotScripts.matrixplot:
require(ggplot2)
require(dplyr)

data <- data %>% select(!(xColumnNames))!(dateConvert)
plt <- pairs(data,pch = 20)
